name: Omni Defender
description:
In this remix of the arcade classic "Defender," protect your galaxy from alien invaders who attempt to kidnap civilians and steal their genetic code!

Every round, you gain points for how many civilians are left alive. Raising your score is crucial for getting upgrades that help you survive the later rounds. Protect your planets as a cautious defender, or go balls-to-the-walls against the alien threat.

This is an early version which I created for a class project :) I hope to add a bit more to the game in later versions, such as shops to choose your ship upgrades and a system for upgrading planets and letting them defend themselves. 

Please enjoy, and feel free to comment your high scores!
